attributes.action: Require a minimum number of petitioners (suggest 20) before a petition is published on this website. This will reduce time wasters and frivolous use of the site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many people are using the e-petition site for personal or stupid petitions which are not in the public interest.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
